name: Patient Zero (ForensicSquid)
description:
Patient Zero: An arcade experience with elements of strategy. Make an army of viruses and take over the body, use speed and quick manuevering to continue spreading you around until well... there's no more resources to consume.

Controls: WASD and mouse to move / attack or Gamepad fully supported. A or right trigger to attack Left thumbstick to move, right thumbstick to aim, right trigger to shoot.
